name: All-in-One AI
author: Wedocore

sections.description: The All-in-One AI WordPress Plugin is a powerful tool that integrates artificial intelligence capabilities into your WordPress website. This plugin provides a wide range of AI features and functionalities to enhance your website’s performance, user experience, and efficiency.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the all-in-one-ai folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the plugin settings page and configure the options as desired.

short_description: The All-in-One AI WordPress Plugin is a powerful tool that integrates artificial intelligence capabilities into your WordPress website.
description: The All-in-One AI WordPress Plugin is a powerful tool that integrates artificial intelligence capabilities into your WordPress website. This plugin provides a wide range of AI features and functionalities to enhance your website’s performance, user experience, and efficiency.

upgrade_notice.1.0.0: This is the initial release of the All-in-One AI WordPress Plugin.
